messages.message:
hello team, a partner is asking for a feature
• Can AIHub after it extracts a PII field (for example IBAN, SSN number, client address etc), redact the field on the document
• process would be
    ◦ 1. client sends document not redacted to aihub
    ◦ 2. aihub extracts the ssn numbers
    ◦ 3. aihub redacts the ssn numbers on the document
    ◦ 4. aihub returns the ssn numbers extracted + the redacted document
Anything like that on our roadmap?

We are getting this ask a lot from Autralian customers: ANZ and NAB.

We can do redaction via an advanced app (not LLM based), but AI Hub native capability would be a big lift
+1 we can do this though an advanced app only
Yeah right now only advanced app but we've heard this and have a ticket https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/EPD-3642
